column4: anyone know when feisty+1 will be out? and what exactly feisty+1 means?
that means the next version after feisty ???
i'm just not sure if it means the next major release or something less major. as it is, my system will not update to feisty because i don't have 50MB of free space on my /boot partition (only 40MB)
i don't remember ubuntu having a minor release between major releases .. whats the minor release between dapper and edgy ??
